result.eng: I left school full of hopes.
result.ga: D'fhág mé an scoil agus mé lán dóchais
result.orig: D'fhág mé an scoil agus mé lán dóchais
result.html: D'fhág mé an scoil agus mé lán dóchaisI left school full of hopes.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág mé an scoil agus mé lán dóċaisI left school full of hopes.

result.eng: In fact, this republic did not receive much international recognition.
result.ga: I ndáiríre níor tugadh a lán aithne idirnáisiúnta don phoblacht seo
result.orig: I ndáiríre níor tugadh a lán aithne idirnáisiúnta don phoblacht seo
result.html: I ndáiríre níor tugadh a lán aithne idirnáisiúnta don phoblacht seoIn fact, this republic did not receive much international recognition.
result.ponchtml: I ndáiríre níor tugaḋ a lán aiṫne idirnáisiúnta don ṗoblaċt seoIn fact, this republic did not receive much international recognition.

result.eng: He has a lot of money in the bank.
result.ga: Tá a lán airgid aige sa bhanc
result.orig: Tá a lán airgid aige sa bhanc
result.html: Tá a lán airgid aige sa bhancHe has a lot of money in the bank.
result.ponchtml: Tá a lán airgid aige sa ḃancHe has a lot of money in the bank.

result.eng: The room is full of smoke.
result.ga: Tá an seomra lán de dheatach
result.orig: Tá an seomra lán de dheatach
result.html: Tá an seomra lán de dheatachThe room is full of smoke.
result.ponchtml: Tá an seomra lán de ḋeataċThe room is full of smoke.

result.eng: This man has a house, a car and a lot of money.
result.ga: Tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seo
result.orig: Tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seo
result.html: Tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seoThis man has a house, a car and a lot of money.
result.ponchtml: Tá teaċ carr agus a lán airgid ag an ḟear seoThis man has a house, a car and a lot of money.

result.eng: He will be completely satisfied with it.
result.html: Beidh sé lán-sásta leisHe will be completely satisfied with it.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ sé lán-sásta leisHe will be completely satisfied with it.

result.eng: For many reasons, this country is divided into two states.
result.ga: Ar a lán údar tá an tír seo deighilte ina dá stát
result.orig: Ar a lán údar tá an tír seo deighilte ina dá stát
result.html: Ar a lán údar tá an tír seo deighilte ina dá státFor many reasons, this country is divided into two states.
result.ponchtml: Ar a lán údar tá an tír seo deiġilte ina dá státFor many reasons, this country is divided into two states.

result.eng: The pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ga: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.orig: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.html: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an pota ċoṁ mór sin go ḃféadfá braċán do ṫeaċ lán boċtán a ḋéanaṁ annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.

result.eng: We a have a lot ahead of us.
result.ga: Tá lán na lámh os ár gcoinne
result.orig: Tá lán na lámh os ár gcoinne
result.html: Tá lán na lámh os ár gcoinneWe a have a lot ahead of us.
result.ponchtml: Tá lán na láṁ os ár gcoinneWe a have a lot ahead of us.
